title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Blended Language Learning Design Utilizing Digital Education Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Digital Literacy and Understanding of Language Education Theories
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Three or more digital language learning modules can be developed according to backward design principles.
Two or more types of language education content (e.g., blogs, webquests) can be produced through PBL (Project-Based Learning) in blended learning environments.
Five or more learner-specific digital portfolio evaluation criteria can be designed using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
